name: Trailblazer Pack
description:
This pack includes:

    - The finished game (digital download) - DRM free
    - A Noverat wallpaper bundle for your desktop and smartphone

---

Noverat is a story driven RPG set in the fantasy world of Kalandria, a land that has become troubled after being abandoned by its deities, the Shapers. The game tells the story of Jay'Dan, a blacksmith who inadvertently embarks on a journey in search of a solution to protect his hometown. During this adventure there will be a lot of unexpected events and Jay'Dan will have some difficult choices to make.

name: Pathfinder Pack
description:
This pack includes:

    - Three unique weapon blueprints (in-game) available only during pre-purchase
    - Early beta access
    - The finished game (digital download) - DRM free
    - A Noverat wallpaper bundle for your desktop and smartphone

---

name: Adventurer Pack
description:
This pack includes:

    - A Mech'an companion will be waiting for you at the forge
    - Two exclusive side-quests with special rewards available only to pre-purchasers (BeastMaster, Blacksmith's Legacy)
    - Three unique weapon blueprints (in-game) available only during pre-purchase
    - Early beta access
    - The finished game (digital download) - DRM free
    - A Noverat wallpaper bundle for your desktop and smartphone

---
